about: Parvaresh–Vardy codes are a family of error-correcting codes first described in 2005 by Farzad Parvaresh and Alexander Vardy.[1] They can be used for efficient list-decoding.
name: Parvaresh–Vardy Code
full_text: Parvaresh–Vardy codes are a family of error-correcting codes first described in 2005 by Farzad Parvaresh and Alexander Vardy.[1] They can be used for efficient list-decoding.
